Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Toto Nyasaye alomesinjia okhukhola obuleeng’afu, nende okhukhola obulayi, nende okhuhelesia abeekho, ne akania eshifwolo nende okhukhola tsimbi. Abebaalilanga mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhumanya

Ne mukhole shingala mulakananga nimwikhonyele elira lia Nyasaye, ne mulafunaka indakano yenyu tawe, nimumalile okhusuubisania, ne nimumalile okhukhola Nyasaye okhuba omuloli wenyu. Toto Nyasaye amanyile kamukholanga

Ne mulaba shinga Omukhasi ulia owateta olusi lulwe ebitonye ebitonye, nilumalilenje okhuba oluumu. Mukholanga ebitsubo bienyu munjila yokhukatania hakari wenyu. Khulwa okhuba mbu omukanda kwa Abandu okhuba nende amani okhushila omukanda kwa Abandu bandi. Toto Nyasaye abatemanga munjila eyo. Ne toto alibaboolela inyanga yeyindukho akamwawukhanilanga
Ne Nyasaye yenyanga yakhabakholele okhuba omukanda mulala butswa. halali alekhanga owayenya okhukora akore, ne alunjisinjia owayenya. Ne toto mulirebwa khukalia koosi kamwakholanga

Ne mulakhola okhwitsuba khwenyu okhuba khwokhukatania hakari wenyu tawe. Eshilenje shiletsa shiarerekha nishibeele nishimalile okhwema, mana mupile amabii kenyu khulwa okhwikalila khunjila ya Nyasaye, mwanyoola eshinyasio eshikhongo
Ne mulakusia amalako ka Nyasaye khubukusi obutiti tawe. Eshili ewa Nyasaye nishio obulayi khwinywe, nikali mbu mwakhamanya
Ebiamuli ninabio biliwa, ne ebili wa Nyasaye nibo bilitong’a, ne toto efwe khulihelesia balia befwila omurungo kwabu khumalayi kabu kabakholanga
Yesiyesi ukhola amalayi abe umusatsa nohomba omukhasi, naye nali omusuubili, khwitsa toto okhumumenyia obulamu obulayi, ne toto khulibarunga omurungo kwabu khumalayi kabu kabakholanga
Ne niwenya okhusoma Ikurani wilinde khu Nyasaye okhurulana nende omusuku shetani owatsubwa
Toto ye abula amani khubalia basuubila , mana besikanga Nyasaye wabu
Amani kaye kali khubalia abamwaambanga obwitsa, nende balia abatsokasinjia Nyasaye
Ne nikhukalukhania eshimanyisio habundu weshimanyisio, ne Nyasaye ni umanyile muno akayeshinjia. Baboola mbu: “ ewe olisa omuchisi” halali abanji mubo shibamanyile tawe.”
Boola: “roho woluyali yekha okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo khubwatoto, khulwokhutinyisia balia basuubila, nende okhuba obulunjifu nende amakhuwa amalayi khubalia abehotselesia
Ne toto khwamanya mbu balaboola mbu: “Omundu niye umwechesinjia” ululimi lwa ulia owabamanyinjia nilweshirende, niluno ni olulimi lweshiarabu lwang’alang’ala
Toto balia balasuubilanga tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye, Nyasaye shabalunjisinjia tawe ne balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu
Balia abachikhanga obubeyi ni balia abalasuubilanga ebimanyisio bia Nyasaye, ne abo nibo ababeyi

Ulia ukhaya Nyasaye namalilenje okhusuubila, halali ulia unichilisibwe ne omwoyo kwaye nikuli khubusilamu, ne ufungulilanga eshilifu shishie obukhayi, obusinyifu bwa Nyasaye buli khubo ne balinyoola eshinyasio eshikhongo
Endio nilwokhuba mbu bo bachama obulamu bwokhushialo okhushila obulamu bwomwikulu, ne toto Nyasaye shalunjisinjia Abandu abakhayi tawe
Abo nibo aba Nyasaye yara eshimanyisio khumioyo chiabu nende tsimbulililo tsiabu nende tsindolelo tsiabu, ne abo nibo abakaandala
Inganakani ibulaho tawe, abo nibo balibula obukhala mwikulu
Mana toto Nyasaye wuwo khubalia abawuya nibakhasandibwa , mana nibalwana mana nibesumilisia, toto Nyasaye imbeli wa ako ni Omulesheli muno Owetsimbabaasi
